go_data.justification: VAMP3 binds directly to the CALMANTH domain as helices in a manner that mimics SNARE complex formation.
VAMP3 mediates the fusion of vesicles with early endosomes/recycling endosomes.
VAMP3 is internalized from the plasma membrane by clathrin-mediated endocytosis due to a direct interaction with the clathrin adaptor CALM.
VAMP3 cycles between the plasma membrane and early endosomes/recycling endosomes.
VAMP3 mediates the fusion of vesicles with early endosomes/recycling endosomes.
